conclusion: Violation of Art. 8;Violation of Art. 6-1;No violation of P1-2 and 13+P1-2;Not necessary to examine Art. 13;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF ERIKSSON v. SWEDEN - [Russian Translation]
